goal.description: Create a utility function in the futarchy/development/utils.py file that converts Unix timestamps to human-readable datetime strings. If the utils.py file doesn't exist, create it.
validation_criteria: Function takes a Unix timestamp (integer) parameter
Function returns a human-readable datetime string
Function includes appropriate docstring explaining its purpose
Function handles both integer and float timestamp inputs
The implementation uses the datetime standard library

execution_history.subgoal: Create the 'format_timestamp' function in the futarchy/development/utils/utils.py file.
